metadata.title: CVE-2024-24680 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Django 3.2 before 3.2.24, 4.2 before 4.2.10, andDjango 5.0 before 5.0.2. The intcomma template filter was subject to apotential denial-of-service attack when used with very long strings.

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
